Articles.Content:
Introducing Snowtiger's third spacecraft posted on the Spacecraft Exchange forum.

The Leopard Supersonic Fighter Jet can reach speeds up to 318m/s while cruising.

It is very easy to control and can do some nice maneuvers like a loop-de-loop and barrel rolls.

It is not an SSTO.

**Features:**

2 Standard Jet Engines with Nacelles

2 Circular Air Intakes

Enchiladas in the glove box

2 Headlights

2 Airbrakes

**Photos:**

![ARdp1Nm.png](http://i.imgur.com/ARdp1Nm.png)

![wSPwYKC.png](http://i.imgur.com/wSPwYKC.png)

![di1qaMo.png](http://i.imgur.com/di1qaMo.png)

![q6t1UIs.png](http://i.imgur.com/q6t1UIs.png)

**Download:**

[https://mega.co.nz/#!ApwSTb6A!c-TYuTlSw8v1WNC0t04lpHrZMbhUpKb2p1b_s6bkxnA](https://mega.co.nz/#!ApwSTb6A!c-TYuTlSw8v1WNC0t04lpHrZMbhUpKb2p1b_s6bkxnA)

**[Compatible with 1.0 KSP or higher]**

**\*ALSO\***

**I will make a master list of my crafts so the Spacecraft Exchange forum doesn't get packed up with my crafts!**

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-10T04:36:29Z" title="05/10/2015 04:36  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 10, 2015</time> by Snowtiger**
